黐字的基本解释

黐
chī
木胶，用细叶冬青茎部的内皮捣碎制成，可以粘住鸟毛，用以捕鸟。

黐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chī］
［《廣韻》丑知切，平支，徹。］
［《廣韻》吕支切，平支，來。］
亦作“粚1”。
木胶。用细叶冬青的茎部内皮捣碎制成。可以粘物。

黐字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黍字部】　黐； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1518第26
【廣韻】丑知切。【集韻】【正韻】抽知切，?音摛。【玉篇】黏也。【廣韻】黐膠所以黏鳥。　又【廣韻】呂支切【集韻】鄰知切，?音離。義同。

黐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黐字的起名意思

暂无。

黐
Basic explanation of words
黐
chī
Wood glue is made by mashing the inner bark of the stem of Holly holly. It can stick to bird feathers and is used to catch birds.
黐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chī］
["Guangyun" ugly knowing cut, flat branch, thorough. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Zhiqie, flat branch, come. ]
Also known as "Jan 1".
Wood glue. It is made by mashing the inner bark of the stem of holly. Can stick things.
黐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Military word department] 　黐; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 1518 26
【Guang Yun】Ugly knows and cuts. [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Pick up knowledge and cut, "Yin". [Jade articles] Sticky. [Guang Yun] The glue is so sticky.　[Guangyun] Lu Zhiqie [Jiyun] Neighbors know and cut,? Sound is separated. The same meaning.
